timeline.bodyText: can you make this code style consistent with the rest of the file?
timeline.author: Adam-
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -86,6 +86,8 @@
 	),
 	DIGSITEPENDANT("digsitependant",
 		DIGSITE_PENDANT, DIGSITE_PENDANT_33417, DIGSITE_PENDANT_33418, DIGSITE_PENDANT_33420
+	),
+	MYTHICALCAPE("mythicalcape", MYTHICAL_CAPE, MOUNTED_MYTHICAL_CAPE

replies.bodyText: Glory, Pools, Repair, etc are all one liners as well.
replies.author: JZomDev

replies.bodyText:
Move the closing paren from the next line to the same line so this line reads:
	MYTHICALCAPE("mythicalcape", MYTHICAL_CAPE, MOUNTED_MYTHICAL_CAPE),
replies.author: Nightfirecat
